Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Thank you for your suggestions.

So I was trying to provide Heritrix the urls which my component gives me as
the modified pages. But I was unable to find the place where I should do
this in the code. As an example,
assume I'm giving, http://www.example.com as the seed. Then this has
following pages,

http://www.example.com/a
http://www.example.com/b
http://www.example.com/c
http://www.example.com/d
http://www.example.com/e

First day I archive whole site.

Then next day my component returns the changed pages as
http://www.example.com/a and http://www.example.com/b. So my requirement is
to get only these two pages and when ever needed merge these two files with
first day archive to create the whole site.(For the moment, forget about
css,js and other files)

Where I should do this in the code?

Thanks in advance and Best Regards

--f46d043bdf78e73fa404e8fd05b4

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
